name: Number Delver
description:
Hackranch makes high-quality interactive experiences available in all the world's languages, especially indigenous, minoritized, and less-spoken languages. Please contact us if you would like to contribute a new translation in your language or dialect (it's easy!), or if you are a teacher and would like to discuss using a Hackranch product in your classroom!

Connect with Hackranch

www.hackranch.com
http://twitter.com/hackranch

Get the original Number Delver soundtrack

https://mordimusic.bandcamp.com/album/number-delver-original-soundtrack
